strings: <voice_0x01000EFC><se_def>Prince Charmles: No, no, no! This won't do! It isn't big enough to impress Father or anyone else for that matter.
<voice_0x01000EFD><se_def>Prince Charmles: If only there were some more Argon lizards! Then we could fight them all and see if we got a bigger one...
<voice_0x01000EFE><se_def>Prince Charmles: But those bothersome lizards keep running away and hiding when they see ME coming! I'm just too intimidating for my own good! Ha ha ha!
<voice_0x01000EFF><se_high>Jessica: Someone's pleased with himself. How much longer have we got to baby-sit this sissy?
<voice_0x01000F00><se_low>Yangus: Who'd wanna 'ave this bloke for a king, eh?
<voice_0x01000F01><se_def>Angelo: Someone needs to pop this brat's bulging ego...

<voice_0x01000F03><se_def>Prince Charmles: Servants! The day's hunt is over.
Find level ground and prepare a campsite for my night's repose.
The party spends the night on the mountaintop.
